title: Print Binary Numbers
statement: You are given an integer n. Your task is to print all binary numbers from 0 to 2^n - 1 in increasing order. Each binary number must be exactly n bits long, padded with leading zeroes if necessary. The output must be sorted in increasing numerical order.
input_format: The first and only line contains an integer n - the number of bits.
output_format: Print 2^n lines. Each line should contain a binary number of exactly n bits, in sorted order from 0 to 2^n - 1.
